# Test fixture: Large nested JSON with arrays
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "user_001",
      "profile": {
        "name": "Complex User",
        "settings": {
          "preferences": ["dark_mode", "notifications"],
          "permissions": {
            "read": true,
            "write": false,
            "admin": false
          }
        }
      },
      "activity": [
        {"timestamp": "2024-01-01", "action": "login"},
        {"timestamp": "2024-01-02", "action": "update_profile"}
      ]
    }
  ],
  "metadata": {
    "total_count": 1,
    "page": 1,
    "has_more": false
  }
}
